content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your name to get started with your electrical service request?
Thanks, Danielle! Could you please provide your address so we can make sure you’re in our service area and get your electrical issue resolved?
Thank you! Please wait a moment while I check if we service your area.
I'm having trouble confirming your service area right now. Let me get a specialist to assist you.

Hi Danielle, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. I see you're having trouble getting your address checked. We definitely service Springfield and Oakwood Ave. Could you tell me more about the electrical issue you're experiencing?
Thanks Edgar. The living room lights keep flickering and sometimes won’t turn on at all.
Thanks for explaining, Danielle. We have technicians available this week. What would be a good day and time for you to have someone come out?
Friday morning is confirmed. We'll send a reminder the day before. If anything changes, just let us know!
reason: Operator Edgar manually scheduled appointment after agent failed service area check.
